adjust_hands.title: Adjust Hands
adjust_hands.description: Allow to change the appearance of the model’s hands. Example use-cases: Remove gloves, get hands out of pockets, long sleeves that should cover hands.

nsfw_filter.title: Nsfw Filter
nsfw_filter.description: Runs NSFW content filter on inputs.

restore_clothes.title: Restore Clothes
restore_clothes.description: Apply additional steps to preserve the appearance of clothes that weren’t swapped (e.g. keep pants if trying-on top).

garment_photo_type.title: Garment Photo Type
garment_photo_type.description: Specifies the type of garment photo to optimize internal parameters for better performance. 'model' is for photos of garments on a model, 'flat-lay' is for flat-lay or ghost mannequin images, and 'auto' attempts to automatically detect the photo type.

cover_feet.title: Cover Feet
cover_feet.description: Allows long garments to cover the feet/shoes or change their appearance.

garment_image.title: Garment Image
garment_image.description: URL or base64 of the garment image

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: Higher guidance scales can help with preserving garment detail, but risks oversaturated colors.

model_image.title: Model Image
model_image.description: URL or base64 of the model image

restore_background.title: Restore Background
restore_background.description: Apply additional steps to preserve the original background. Runtime will be slower. Not needed for simple backgrounds.

category.title: Category
category.description: Category of the garment to try-on.

num_samples.title: Num Samples
num_samples.description: Number of images to generate in a single run. Image generation has a random element in it, so trying multiple images at once increases the chances of getting a good result.

timesteps.title: Timesteps
timesteps.description: Determines how many steps the diffusion model will take to generate the image. For simple try-ons, steps can be reduced for faster runtime.

long_top.title: Long Top
long_top.description: Adjusts internal parameters for better performance on long tops such as: Longline shirts, tunics, coats, etc.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Sets random operations to a fixed state. Use the same seed to reproduce results with the same inputs, or different seed to force different results.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.
